import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Form from 'react-validation/build/form'; import Input from 'react-validation/build/input'; import { isEmail } from "validator"; import AuthService from "../services/auth.service"; import './Login.css'; function Login({ show, close }) { const [toggler, setToggler] = useState(false); return (
